physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 4 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Milton M. Schayer, Died Dec 11 1935, former president Jewish Family and Children's Service, #472.''

mods.abstract: Formal portrait of Milton M. Schayer. Schayer was a president of Jewish Family and Children's Services of Denver.
mods.note: Donated by Jewish Family and Children's Services of Colorado.
